description: An ace pilot of the regular Earth Federation Forces, assigned to the space cruiser Bosnia and stationed at the Luna II asteroid base. The tough, aggressive Lila is assigned to back up the Titans during their pursuit of the AEUG flagship Argama. Her initial rivalry with the arrogant Titan officers gives way to amused pity for the hapless Jerid Messa, and Lila takes it upon herself to give this so-called elite soldier a crash course in basic combat survival.
name: Lila Milla Rira
